  index: "museums",
  field: "location",
  zoom: 13,
  x: 4207,
  y: 2692,
  grid_agg: "geotile",
  grid_precision: 2,
  fields: ["name", "price"],
  query: {
    term: {
      included: true,
    },
  },
  aggs: {
    min_price: {
      min: {
        field: "price",
      },
    },
    max_price: {
      max: {
        field: "price",
      },
    },
    avg_price: {
      avg: {
        field: "price",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
